topic: Uncovering the heart of my Nana’s saltwater stories

ideas.title: The Great St Kilda Pier Crab Conspiracy
ideas.premise: Nana's saltwater stories reveal a secret society of St Kilda Pier crabs controlling Melbourne's weather.
ideas.why_funny: Absurd premise combined with a beloved Melbourne landmark and conspiracy tropes.

ideas.title: Nanna's Nemo Nightmare
ideas.premise: Nana accidentally releases a clownfish into the Yarra River, causing ecological chaos and hilarious misunderstandings.
ideas.why_funny: Juxtaposition of a tropical fish in the muddy Yarra and Nana's cluelessness.

ideas.title: The Brighton Bathing Box Buccaneers
ideas.premise: Nana's tales expose a group of elderly pirates using Brighton's bathing boxes as their secret headquarters.
ideas.why_funny: Combining the iconic bathing boxes with the unexpected image of geriatric pirates.

ideas.title: The Legendary Loch Yarra Monster
ideas.premise: Nana claims the Yarra River hides a mythical creature, leading to a chaotic monster hunt involving Melburnians.
ideas.why_funny: Parody of the Loch Ness Monster myth, set in the less-than-glamorous Yarra River.

ideas.title: Seagull Shenanigans at Southbank
ideas.premise: Nana's stories depict Southbank seagulls as highly organized criminals, stealing chips and causing mayhem.
ideas.why_funny: Relatable annoyance with seagulls amplified to criminal levels in a tourist hotspot.

ranking: The Great St Kilda Pier Crab Conspiracy
